name: Chicken Soup with Cabbage
author: Sandra Holding
summary: This soup will cure what ails you. Even if it's just hunger. Healthy, low carb, and great for a rainy day. I've been making this recipe for 30 years, and I think this is about as good as it gets. Enjoy with freshly baked biscuits.
directions: Fill a large pot with 4 quarts water
Add chicken; bring to a boil
Cook until chicken is coming apart, about 45 minutes
Remove from heat; remove chicken from pot and transfer to a platter
Put a lid on the pot and cover the chicken with plastic wrap
Refrigerate both until chicken is safe to handle, about 40 minutes
Tear meat off the chicken bones
Skim excess fat off the top of the cooled broth
Add the last 2 quarts water, chicken meat, carrots, cabbage, celery, onion, wine, bouillon, dill, butter, garlic, parsley, thyme, white pepper, and bay leaves
Cook over medium heat until vegetables have softened, about 30 minutes
